channel.title: How do i use no ip
channel.description: how do i use no ip cause i downloaded it and i have a server name but how do i get my server to go through it or how to get my server to go on when i put that ip address... if someone knows please tell me.

item.title: How do i use no ip
item.dc:creator: @barthy barthy
item.description:
@barthy wrote:

i know but when i have the no ip how do i run my server using that cause when i do that it says the server is down… i don’t get it.

item.title: How do i use no ip
item.dc:creator: @Eportal Eportal
item.description:
@Eportal wrote:

Client… How can a client run on no-ip? You only run servers on it… To run a client just run it in your clients folder.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i use no ip

item.title: How do i use no ip
item.dc:creator: @killer_numba_1 killer numba 1
item.description:
@killer_numba_1 wrote:

oh ok. Go to control pannel. then click security center> windows firewall…click exeptions in the properties… then after make one.

Name: (server name)
Port: (your port ur using.)
then tcp for ppl to connect… press ok. then it will make the ip adress connect to ur server ip… which connects to ur router (port foward) which connects to ppls internet.

Read full topic
